languages.text: "Я не сомневался в вас, господин Ханейманн. Приятно знать, что корабль {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости доверен под опеку человеку, которому знакомы понятия "честь" и "преданность".
"I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
languages.original_text: "Я не сомневался в вас, господин Ханейманн. Приятно знать, что корабль {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости доверен под опеку человеку, которому знакомы понятия "честь" и "преданность".

traits.locale_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我从来没有怀疑过你，哈努曼大师。我很高兴知道，舰长大人的船被托付给了一位懂得何谓荣誉与忠诚的贤者。”
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没有怀疑过你，哈努曼大师。我很高兴知道，舰长大人的船被托付给了一位懂得何谓荣誉与忠诚的贤者。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai toujours eu foi en vous, maître Haneumann. Je suis content que le vaisseau de Sa Seigneurie ait été confié à quelqu'un qui comprenne aussi bien les notions d'honneur et de loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai toujours eu foi en vous, maître Haneumann. Je suis content que le vaisseau de Sa Seigneurie ait été confié à quelqu'un qui comprenne aussi bien les notions d'honneur et de loyauté. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Nunca he dudado de usted, maestro Haneumann. Es bueno saber que mi{mf|lord|lady} ha encomendado su nave al cargo de alguien que entiende el honor y la lealtad».
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he dudado de usted, maestro Haneumann. Es bueno saber que mi{mf|lord|lady} ha encomendado su nave al cargo de alguien que entiende el honor y la lealtad».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたのことは信じていましたよ、マスタ－・ヘニュマン。陛下の船を、名誉と忠誠とを理解する者に預けられるとは、結構なことです」
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのことは信じていましたよ、マスタ－・ヘニュマン。陛下の船を、名誉と忠誠とを理解する者に預けられるとは、結構なことです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht an Euch gezweifelt, Meister Haneumann. Es ist gut zu wissen, dass das Schiff {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft} jemandem anvertraut wurde, der Ehre und Loyalität versteht."
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht an Euch gezweifelt, Meister Haneumann. Es ist gut zu wissen, dass das Schiff {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft} jemandem anvertraut wurde, der Ehre und Loyalität versteht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."

languages.text: "Sizden hiç şüphem yoktu Üstat Haneumann. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gemisinin onur ve sadakatten anlayan birine emanet edildiğini bilmek ne güzel."
languages.original_text: "I did not doubt you, Master Haneumann. It is good to know that {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s vessel has been entrusted to the care of someone who understands honour and loyalty."
